resultUnderCurse: and failed to complete my mission... but with little to no cost to myself.
and failed to complete my mission... with great cost to my reputation.
and failed to complete my mission... with a great cost to my friends and family.
and failed to complete my mission... at the risk of the Exalted Host.
and failed to complete my mission... but with mysteriously no reaction.
and completed my mission... due to a sacrifice of people or resources.
and completed my mission... with the help of those I rather not ask for aid.
and completed my mission... at a cost of my soul or sanity.
and completed my mission... only because of a great betrayal.
and completed my mission... with no clear outcome...the memory grows murky.
